metadata.description: Yesterday, Walter tried to kill himself. Today, he wakes up to find that everyone who comes near him suddenly and inexplicably dies. Everyone, that is, except for a mysterious lady named Eliza, who is desperately trying to keep Walter safe from a deadly assassin known as Miller - which would be easy if he didn't keep coming back from the dead without a scratch on him. Learn the true meaning of life and death in AFFLICTION.
metadata.name: Affliction
